verses.roman:
eteṣāṁ putra-pautrāś ca
babhūvuḥ koṭiśo nṛpa
mātaraḥ kṛṣṇa-jātīnāṁ
sahasrāṇi ca ṣoḍaśa

synonyms: eteṣām—of these; putra—sons; pautrāḥ—and grandsons; ca—and; babhūvuḥ—were born; koṭiśaḥ—by the tens of millions; nṛpa—O King; mātaraḥ—the mothers; kṛṣṇa-jātīnām—of the descendants of Lord Kṛṣṇa; sahasrāṇi—thousands; ca—and; ṣoḍaśa—sixteen.
translation: My dear King, the sons and grandsons of Lord Kṛṣṇa's children numbered in the tens of millions. Sixteen thousand mothers gave rise to this dynasty.
